General.Name: W&T Offshore Inc
General.Description: W&T Offshore, Inc., an independent oil and natural gas producer, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and natural gas properties in the Gulf of Mexico. The company sells crude oil, natural gas liquids, and natural gas. W&T Offshore, Inc. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 5718 Westheimer Road, Houston, TX, United States, 77057-5745

4.Name: Mr. Jonathan C. Curth
